title: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. See tests/new/binaryWarnings/.. for code to reproduce the problem. However, note that these tests may result in false positives due to the lack of filename checking in harness verification of messages. In AJDT, the filename may be omitted if it does not make sense to AJDT.
OB: When declaring warning messages for .class files from injars, the sourcepath is shown as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. In some cases, the filenames may not appear at all, although this issue is not reproduced by the provided tests.
EB: When declaring warning messages for .class files from injars, the sourcepath should be displayed as 'app/Main' instead of 'app.Main.class'.
SR:
1. Run the code in tests/new/binaryWarnings/..
2. Observe the declare warning messages
3. Note that the sourcepath is displayed incorrectly as 'app.Main.class'
4. Observe that some filenames may not appear in the declare warning messages
